rows.label: qev065101_MSG0001
rows.name: You're back. I've been waiting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065101_MSG0002
rows.name:
...What? Surprised to have a criminal with a record of
trickery come to see you all on her own?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065101_MSG0003
rows.name:
Lara Nara said he'd let me go free if I came and
talked to you. So here I am.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065101_MSG0004
rows.name:
I have no idea what my next move is after turning
on the Ganglion. Do you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065101_JNK0010
rows.name: Suggest

rows.label: qev065101_SEL0011
rows.name: Propose that Erio join you in fighting them.

rows.label: qev065101_JNK0020
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev065101_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Erio that she has to find that answer for herself.

rows.label: qev065101_MSG0005
rows.name:
You taught me the joy of living. The workings of life.
I'd like to continue to nurture that within me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065101_MSG0006
rows.name:
But that would mean making an enemy of all my sisters
who work for the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065101_MSG0007
rows.name:
I don't know if I'm capable of that.
Capable of hurting a fellow Definian, I mean.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065101_MSG0008
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065101_MSG0009
rows.name:
No. Allowing my sisters to go on compounding their
crimes in thoughtless obedience is far worse.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065101_MSG0010
rows.name: For myself? Hmm. You may be right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065101_MSG0011
rows.name:
We Definians have lived all this while devoid of our
own will, following orders blindly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065101_MSG0012
rows.name:
We've deceived others without a thought,
and taken countless lives.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065101_MSG0013
rows.name:
If I am to walk a new path, it must be as you do.
I must decide my own destination and see myself there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065101_MSG0014
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065101_MSG0015
rows.name:
There is one task before me which takes precedence
over all others...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065101_MSG0016
rows.name: I must free my sisters from their loathsome mission![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065101_MSG0017
rows.name:
Will you help me? You are the only one in this city
who knows who I truly am. I can turn to no one else.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065101_MSG0018
rows.name: Fortun is coming topside. This could be our chance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065101_MSG0019
rows.name:
I have deceived you time and again, and still you
would help me. Thank you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065101_MSG0020
rows.name:
I feel like I understand why Lara Nara sent me to
speak to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065101_JNK0050
rows.name: Ask about Fortun

rows.label: qev065101_SEL0051
rows.name: Press Erio for more information about Fortun.

rows.label: qev065101_JNK0060
rows.name: Ask about Lara

rows.label: qev065101_SEL0061
rows.name: Inquire about Erio's relationship with Lara Nara.

rows.label: qev065101_MSG0021
rows.name:
The sage Fortun has given our orders since ancient
times, though I have never seen her in person.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065101_MSG0022
rows.name:
She is being transported across Sylvalum right now,
guarded by my sisters.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065101_MSG0023
rows.name:
He is the cruel dog who inflicted this freedom upon me!
It was...punishment for my crimes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065101_MSG0024
rows.name:
He helped me obtain all the privileges of a full resident
and promised to take the blame himself if anything
went wrong.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065101_MSG0025
rows.name:
...It is more trust than I can stand to break.
I have to see my duty done.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065101_MSG0026
rows.name:
As you may know, the sage Fortun has given us our
orders since ancient times.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065101_MSG0027
rows.name:
And while I have never seen her in person, I know she
is being transported through Sylvalum now, guarded by
my sisters.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065101_MSG0028
rows.name:
If we can take her out, we may be able to free them
from bondage.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065101_MSG0029
rows.name:
Please find that Definian squad and take Fortun from
them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065101_MSG0030
rows.name:
Fortun is being transported through Sylvalum now,
along with an elite escort.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065101_MSG0031
rows.name:
If we fail to make contact, we may not have the chance
again. You must steal Fortun away from them any way
you can.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065101_MSG0032
rows.name: I feel her... You have brought Fortun here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065101_MSG0033
rows.name:
So that is what has ruled over us as queen and
mother all these years...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065101_MSG0034
rows.name:
For all the crimes she forced upon us, I can't help but
feel a nostalgic warmth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065101_JNK0030
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev065101_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Erio what she will do now.

rows.label: qev065101_JNK0040
rows.name: Dismiss

rows.label: qev065101_SEL0041
rows.name: Say that Fortun didn't seem all that impressive.

rows.label: qev065101_MSG0035
rows.name:
Analyze the data, first and foremost. My sisters are far
too mercurial to pin down unless I have an absolute
grasp of all the Definians.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065101_MSG0036
rows.name:
This is my first time meeting her face-to-face as well.
...Honestly, I thought she'd be taller.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065101_MSG0037
rows.name:
But she is still the queen who exerted total dominance
over large portions of the galaxy—I'd advise you not to
take her lightly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065101_MSG0038
rows.name: I think it's time I had a long talk with Mother here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065101_MSG0039
rows.name:
And when I'm done, I will stop my sisters from doing
any more evil—no matter what it takes.[ST:wait ]
